sentence: Ron DeSantis participated in the Republican Party’s attempt to sanitize January 6 by refusing to call the attack an insurrection.” Orlando, the Herald’s editorial board adds, was where the 2022 America First Political Action Conference was held in February — with Republican speakers who included Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene of Georgia and Rep. Paul Gosar of Arizona.
author: Alex Henderson
title: Miami newspaper’s blistering editorial: 'Republicans have a white nationalist problem'

sentence: The newspaper singled out DeSantis for taking part in the GOP's whitewashing of the deadly riot by refusing to call the attack an insurrection, although two days later Oath Keepers leader Stewart Rhodes was charged with seditious conspiracy, and other Republicans also minimized the violent attack at this year's Conservative Political Action Conference in Orlando -- where GOP lawmakers Marjorie Taylor Greene and Paul Gosar took part in a white nationalist conference.
author: Travis Gettys
title: 'Republicans have a white nationalist problem': Florida newspaper lays waste to the GOP

sentence: Ron DeSantis seeking to downplay the Jan. 6 insurrection and the participation of Reps. Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-Ga.) and Paul Gosar (R-Ariz.) in a white nationalist conference in Orlando.
author: Lee Moran
title: Miami Herald Rips GOP’s ‘Terrifying Tolerance Of White Supremacy’
